chariot 1.0.0

Lookup a Concept Id

Source: R/x_lookup.R
get_concept.Rd

Lookup a Concept Id

get_concept(
  concept_id,
  vocab_schema = "omop_vocabulary",
  conn,
  conn_fun = "connectAthena()",
  cache_only = FALSE,
  skip_cache = FALSE,
  override_cache = FALSE,
  render_sql = FALSE,
  verbose = FALSE,
  sleepTime = 1
)

Value

Concept Class object if the `concept_id` argument is found in the Concept table. If it is not found, nothing is returned.

Examples

library(tidyverse)
library(chariot)

lookup_atc_class_ingredients(atc_concept_obj = 21601787)

#> 
#> ── Retrieve Concept Object ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> 
#> ── Is Concept Id Valid Integer? ────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> ✓ Concept Id is a valid integer
#> 
#> ── Lookup Concept Id in Concept Table ──────────────────────────────────────────
#> Connecting using PostgreSQL driver
#> [2021-01-02 14:21:47]	Postgres connection to 'athena' closed
#> ✓ Concept Id `21601787` found in Concept Table
#> 
#> ── Lookup Synonyms ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> 
#> ── Lookup 'Maps to' Concept Names ──────────────────────────────────────────────
#> Error in check_conn_status(conn = conn): argument "conn" is missing, with no default

lisinopril_class <- get_concept(concept_id = 21601787)

#> 
#> ── Is Concept Id Valid Integer? ────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> ✓ Concept Id is a valid integer
#> 
#> ── Lookup Concept Id in Concept Table ──────────────────────────────────────────
#> Connecting using PostgreSQL driver
#> [2021-01-02 14:21:48]	Postgres connection to 'athena' closed
#> ✓ Concept Id `21601787` found in Concept Table
#> 
#> ── Lookup Synonyms ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> 
#> ── Lookup 'Maps to' Concept Names ──────────────────────────────────────────────
#> Error in lookup_maps_to(concept_id = concept_id, vocab_schema = vocab_schema,     conn = conn, cache_only = cache_only, skip_cache = skip_cache,     override_cache = override_cache, render_sql = render_sql,     verbose = verbose, sleepTime = sleepTime): argument "conn" is missing, with no default
lisinopril_class

#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'lisinopril_class' not found

lookup_atc_class_ingredients(atc_concept_obj = lisinopril_class)

#> Error in class(atc_concept_obj) %in% "concept": object 'lisinopril_class' not found
